title: [Client] Essence Collector Ward Skin missing in Champion Select
body:
Essence collector ward skin doesn't show up in the ward selection popup in champ select. However, I had it selected before the patch and this what I see:
https://i.imgur.com/WBMIFAU.png
If i don't select any other ward, the essence collector skin apparently remains equipped and I can use it in game:
https://i.imgur.com/eOPZrD6.png
